mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply values (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply},#{replyer}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replydate, case when to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') = to_char(updatedate,'yyyymmdd') then to_char(updatedate,'hh:mi:ss') else to_char(updatedate,'yyyy/mm/dd') end updatedate from tbl_reply where bno=#{bno}
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply=#{reply}, replyer=#{replyer}, updatedate=sysdate where rno=#{rno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_reply where bno = ${bno}
